summary.para: Represents details of the padding of an INI item, such as a , , and a .
Padding is used to represent the exact formatting of the INI item in the object model.

member.summary: The amount of space to the left of the INI item.

member.summary: The amount of space to the right of the INI item.

member.summary: The number of spaces in the padding.
